amendatorysection.para: For the purposes of the Alzheimer's Special Care Disclosure Act, Alzheimer's special care unit shall mean any nursing facility or assisted-living facility, licensed by the Department of Health and Human Services, which secures, segregates, or provides a special program or special unit for residents with a diagnosis of probable Alzheimer's disease, dementia, or a related disorder and which advertises, markets, or otherwise promotes the facility as providing specialized Alzheimer's disease, dementia, or related disorder care services.
